data.title: Nice place for lunch
data.text: Great salad bar and the soup selection was awesome! The atmosphere was very unique and homie. Hard to find a place like this. I'll try the sandwiches next time.

data.title: Wow to the chicken!!
data.text: Small...quaint...nice people...good service.  Came here for lunch.  Soup was good...and nice selection.  I had a club sandwich.  Also good but hard to mess up a club I know...but my wife got the chicken.  WOW. never had chicken so tender...fell apart with a fork. Great flavor too.  Will be back so I can get that!!

data.title: Great soup and salad
data.text:
I always think I'm going to have a sandwich when I go here, but then I spot the six different selections of soup Joe has cooked up for the day, and the wonderful salad bar and my decision is made!  

Jan is a wonderful hostess and makes everyone feel right at home!

data.title: Great place for lunch!
data.text: Had lunch today at this little place for the first time. I had no idea it even existed until a coworker told me about it. They've been there 7 years. I was impressed and will be back. I got the salad bar and a bowl of soup. They have over 40 items on the salad bar and had 5 soups to choose from. I had the potato soup and it was unlike any I've ever had. It was almost like a white gravy taste. It was good tho with big chunks of perfectly cooked potato. They offer free tea (with anything from green tea to fruit infused) and it was very tasty! The owner was super friendly and it was only $7.50!!

data.title: Great salad bar!
data.text: My mom and I love a good salad bar. Thanks to TripAdvisor, I found this place and it did not disappoint. The salad bar has over 40 items and everything was really fresh and kept well stocked. You can pay a little extra and add soup with a choice of 6 soups available. The owner Jan was so nice! Complimentary iced tea made the experience even better. We will go back next time we're in town!

data.title: best salad bar value in town
data.text: My husband and I love going to the Twilight Bistro. We probably go at least twice a week to etat their salad bar. They usually hate fresh fruit, chunks of chicken or times of cheeses including feta and blue. The owners Jan and Joe R a great team. Jan always has a joke for the day. I highly recommend their salad bar.

data.title: Best place to eat in Evansville indiana
data.text: While visiting the local attractions in Evansville indiana we asked the young lady at the reception desk of the Science, History and Art museum where we could find a great but still an affordable meal. She immediately suggested the Twilight Bistro. The fair is somewhat limited to sandwiches and burgers you can also get a salad or bowl of soup included and the tea is part of the price. I highly recommend this establishment.

data.title: Great lunch spot
data.text: Staff/owners are extremely friendly and courteous.  Food is good and prices are very reasonable.  Would recommend!
